name: Fight Knight - A Night to Fight
name_original: Fight Knight - A Night to Fight
description:
A 1 vs 1 Fighter/Brawler with robust combat. Both knights duke it out toe-to-toe, dueling with slashes, blocks, and parries. Created from the dream of a 2-player PunchOut. Made in GameMaker Studio. Currently PC only.

Menu Controls ↑ ←↓→ and Space

Combat Controls In-Game

WASD - FGH / CVB

Arrow Keys - KL; / m,.

Arthur Moua - User Interface Carl Lee - Project Lead, Lead Programmer Chaz Acheronti - Game Designer, Artist Ryan Huculak - Game Designer, Music Composition Steve Lee - Programmer

Nirav Patel - Programmer Conner K Ward - Artist
